summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Department of Parks and Recreation; authorizing the Superintendent to apply for, accept, and execute a grant agreement with the State Department of Ecology (DOE); and further accept a $25,000 contribution from Puget Sound Energy (PSE), for financial assistance to help prepare the Gasworks Park Feasibility Study and develop a remedial clean-up plan for the site; and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Cumulative Reserve Sub-Fund therefor, all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
